snippet.title: Colecovision - The Activision Decathlon - 10732 points
snippet.description:
I played a lot the Atari 2600 version of this game at the time.
The Colecovision version has (obviously) better graphics but the same feeling.

Retroarch is used with Xbox controller set as retropad (forced).
Analog stick to run.
